page.title: 13Mortlach Primary School
page.content: Mortlach School was built in 1902.The first headmaster was Mr J. Shand.The present headmaster is Mr G.R.Donald. The school is situated in York Street whiich runs pararell with Balvenie Street.The school was previously a secondary school but was down_graded in 19 It is a 1 stream school with pupils from P1 to P7.It has 7 class_ rooms,2General Purposes room,1T.V. room,a Library,a large games hall and adequate cloakroom areas.School meeals are cooked and served on the premises by Mrs B.Cruickshank and 2 other members of canteen staff.There is a full_time janitor who has 3 cleaning staff.
